mapper.sql: tsbusinessid, tsname, tsproductid, tssmoke, tsregress, tsorder
mapper.select:
select
from tsbusiness ORDER BY tsbusinessid LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert:

tsbusinessid,
tsname,
tsproductid,

tsorder,

mapper.update:
update tsbusiness

tsproductid = #{tsproductid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tssmoke = #{tssmoke,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tsregress = #{tsregress,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tsorder = #{tsorder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where tsbusinessid = #{tsbusinessid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
